hero.cta: First, I solve the problem. Then, I write the code.

aboutMe.title: Rendering My Story
aboutMe.paragraph1: I am a Full Stack developer with a strong Frontend focus. I’m passionate about creating elegant and functional interfaces, turning complex ideas into simple and effective digital solutions.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I mainly work with JavaScript and TypeScript, using React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern databases. I’m always learning new technologies and best practices to keep growing and building increasingly solid products.
